fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player and learn their role during the day, at the end of the night, they will get a new goal based on their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Immune to frames of any kind.
- You may suggest a goal to the host.
- Your goal is added on top of the other goal, they may complete one of them to win, you also only need to complete only 1 of your goals to win.
- You may self target and give a player multiple extra goals.

fields.name: Goals:
fields.value:
- Have 2 of the goals you gave completed.
- Survive to the end of the game alongside 2 playes with extra goals
- Be killed by a player you gave an extra goal.
